fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Give a new boost to jobs, growth and investment through strengthening the European fund for strategic investment, modernising trade defence instruments, improving waste management in a circular economy, making progress on the banking union and on the capital markets union 
addressing the social dimension of the EU, in particular through enhancing the youth employment initiative, improving social security coordination, allowing easier access of accessible products and services to the market and creating a European solidarity corps 
better protecting EU citizens' security, in particular through better protecting external borders (via an entry-exit system, smart border and a European travel information authorisation system), stronger rules on buying and possessing firearms, fighting terrorism, money laundering and terrorist financing and information exchange on third country nationals
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The association aims at: 
a)the promotion of information and transparency oh the functioning of democratic institutions through the use of information technology 
b)awareness and active participation of citizens in the drafting of the legal framework 
c) taking initiatives in scientific research 
d) strengthening the promotion and enhancement of volunterism
relevant_communication:
Gov2u is the leader of communication and dissemination activities of the following EU funded projects: 
- e-Skills Match project - Project number: ECOKT2014-7 (30-CE-0726730/00-60); Duration: September 2015 - August 2017; Project website: http://www.eskillsmatch.eu/en/ 
- COMRADES: Collective Platform for Community Resilience and Social Innovation during Crises - Project number: 687847; Duration: January 2016 – December 2018; Project website: http://www.comrades-project.eu/ 
- Mobile Age - Project number: 693319; Duration: February 2016 – January 2019;  Project website: http://www.mobile-age.eu/ 
- FLOOD-serv: Public FLOOD Emergency and Awareness SERVice - Project number: 693599; Duration: May 2016 – April 2019; Project website: http://www.floodserv-project.eu/
